content.text: Hi, I'm Andrew. I'm a swimmer, I have a beautiful rose garden, my parents met at Woodstock, I have a cat named Pickles, and I love Starbucks coffee.

Hi Andrew, I'm Sarah. I enjoy eating pumpkins, I have a small beagle dog named Droopy, I use third party programs to read portable documents instead of Adobe, I enjoy watching videos on YouTube, and I love eating shrimp dipped in barbecue sauce.
That's great! What do you like about swimming?
I like the way it makes me feel. I feel like I'm in control of my body and I'm able to push myself to my limits.
I know what you mean. I love the feeling of being in the water and the way it helps me relax.
Me too! I also love the feeling of being a part of a team and working together to achieve a common goal.
That's definitely a great part of swimming. I'm glad you enjoy it!
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about roses?
I love the way they smell. They're so fragrant and beautiful.
I know what you mean. I love the way they smell too. They're also so pretty to look at.
Me too! I love having them in my garden. They're a beautiful addition to any home.
I know what you mean. I have a lot of roses in my garden too. They're one of my favorite flowers.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy them as much as I do.
